Christmas Pathway Lights – Multicolored Light Bulb for Holiday Decorations!
Waterproof Christmas Yard Lights: Christmas stake lights comply with the rain test of UL certification, PVC made, tough for all kinds of weather. These holiday pathway lights are wonderful decorations for home, patio, lawn, bistro, pub, cafe, restaurant, shopping center, supermarket, New Year, birthday, gathering, disco ball party, dinner party, evening party. The AC plug is not waterproof, it should be protected from the rainy day
Replaceable: Turn the yard Christmas lights support on the base and pull out the internal C7 light bulb from the outer jumbo c9 bulb, screw out the damaged bulb from the bulb holder, then screw in a new one gently. And turning off one light will not cause the other lights to go out, which is very user-friendly. These light strings are extremely durable and have an average life of 5,000 hours
Connectable Christmas Walkway Lights: These connectable Christmas outdoor decorations lawn lights are easy to install with a cable tie or cup hook, fix it or place it anywhere necessary, up to 17 strands connectable to optimize the need for larger area lighting and festival decorations. With the anchor spike plugging in the snowfield, the Christmas pathway lights are definitely the blooming flowers in the winter garden
Product Including: Set of 2 Christmas light sets come with 10 c7 lights bulbs, 10 multicolored jumbo c9 bulbs. Shell colors are orange, red, blue, green, yellow and the has the effect of beautiful when light them up. Christmas light sets come with 2 spare fuse and 4 spare C7 bulbs for easy replacement. Amazing landscape stake lights, perfect for residential, commercial, and holiday decorations

Meet Bluey! A loveable, six-year-old Blue Heeler dog, whose everyday family life becomes a playful adventure. Bluey and her friends have made up a fun game! Play a game of “Shadowlands”. Stay in the shadowy bits, collect 5 cupcake cards and be the first to the picnic! There is a palm tree in the center of the board that players turn to change the shadowy bits as they play! This fun and unpredictable board game is great for children ages 3 and up!
Country of origin : China
Turn the palm tree: Turn the palm tree in the center of the board and see the shadowy bits change!
Fun to play: Based on the fun adventures of Bluey and her friends, this board game is full of fun and laughter
Totally unpredictable: A game that keeps changing and is totally unpredictable! For ages 3 and up!

Read more

Bluey and her friends are ready to play a game of “Shadowlands” with you!

This is such a fun game to play! The way Bluey describes it is – “It’s a game where all the shadowy grassy bits are the land, and all the bits in the sun is the sea!” The idea is to be the first one to the picnic by staying in the shadowy bits and collecting cupcakes! Based on one of Bluey’s episodes including Bingo, Coco and Snickers? Turn the palm tree in the center of the board to change the shadowy bits as you play! This fun and unpredictable board game is great for children ages 3 and up!

Read more

There is unpredictable fun in this continually changing game!

In the center of the board is a very special palm tree. By turning the palm tree you can change the shadowy bits and the direction of the clouds! If you are lucky it might even give you a cupcake!

Read more

Product Description

2-in-1 Halloween Christmas Projector Lights Moving Patterns Landscape Waterproof Light

Specifications:

Power Output: 14V

Power Consumption: 10.5W

Waterproof Grade: IP65

Power Input: 100-240V, 50/60HZ

Projection Distance: 3-7m / 8.94-22.96ft

Use Scene: Indoor/Outdoor

16 Slides Patterns Mode & 10 Colors Water Wave Mode Create Various Effects for Holiday

16 Holiday Slides Patterns: 5 for Christmas 3 for Halloween 1 for Thanksgiving 1 for Birthday 6 for Celebration

Package Includes:

1 * LED Projector Light

1 * Remote Controller (Without Batteries)

16 * Pattern Slides

1 * Power Adapter

1 * Flat Base

1 * Ground Stake

1 * User Manual

IP65 Waterproof & Easy to Install: The Christmas projector light is designed with an IP65 waterproof rating that is suitable for rain or snow weather. Note: Do not soak it in the water directly. It is easy to install, just find the place you want then plug it into the ground, stable and durable.
Indoor & Outdoor Use: Find the place you want then plug it on the ground, fixed on the wall, ceiling, or put it on a flat surface. To better work (get better brightness and visibility)in the dark environment, place the floodlight 10 -15ft from the projection surface. You also can remotely control the color setting.
Wireless Remote & Auto-Timer: The Halloween Christmas projector light comes with a remote controller and timer . You could use the RF wireless remote control to turn on or off the light, set time 2/4 hours, switch the color of the light, moving speed, and flashing speed to create a fantastical and dynamic effect.
Wonderful Holiday Decoration: This Christmas projector light has 16 slides, the best choice to liven up the atmosphere, suitable for Halloween, Christmas, Thanksgiving day, Valentine’s Day, birthday, holidays, etc. Also Great for a gift for family, relatives, friends or colleagues.

Read more

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);

thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;

if (errorDiv) {

onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

offlineStoreName.value = ”;

offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,
offlineStoreInputForm,

onlineCalendar,

);

Price: $11.99 - $9.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:20:02 UTC – Details)


Mancala is one of the world’s oldest and best-loved games, and Pressman’s folding wooden Mancala board offers an affordable way to play that makes a great travel game as well as a wonderful home edition. Players take turns scooping up the special stones and counting them out one at a time into the pockets on the board. When they drop a stone into an empty pocket on their side of the board, they capture all the stones in the opposite pocket. It sounds like a simple marble game, but it’s got plenty of strategy and reinforces STEM skills like counting and strategic planning. The winner is the player who collects the most stones! This folding Mancala includes a hinged wooden playing board, 48 plastic stones, and complete instructions.
Invented thousands of years ago, Mancala is one of the world’s favorite games of counting and strategy
Hinged wooden board folds for easy storage, making it a great choice for home and travel
Reinforces STEM and STEAM skills
Tested for safety and quality
For 2 players, ages 6 and up


Read more


Mancala Wooden Folding Set by Pressman, Ages 6 and Up, 2 Players

Mancala is one of the world’s oldest and best-loved games. Players take turns scooping up the special stones and counting them out one at a time into the pockets on the board. When they drop a stone into an empty pocket on their side of the board, they capture all the stones in the opposite pocket. The player who collects the most stones wins!




Easy to learn gameplay

This classic game with simple rules is loved by kids and adults alike! Players drop stones into pockets on the board as they try to capture the stones in their opponent’s pockets to win!

Reinforces STEM skills

Mancala sounds like a simple marble game, but it’s got plenty of strategy and reinforces STEM skills like counting and strategic planning.

Great for home and travel

The folding wooden board easily stores all pieces in a convenient compact size, making this a great choice for home or travel.

Read more

Mancala – Wooden Folding Set Mancala for Kids Mexican Train Dominoes Family Classics Chess Mastermind
Description In this game of strategy, players scoop up stones and count them out one at a time into the pockets on the board. Drop a stone into an empty pocket on your side to capture all the stones in the opposite pocket. Collect the most stones to win! Now kids can enjoy the classic game of Mancala in this special edition where the gemstones are replaced with cute plastic animals! With just a few easy rules to follow, the object is to collect the most animals by the end of the game to win. Introduce your family to a new way to play the old classic game of dominoes! Play all the dominoes from your hand onto one or more chains, or “trains,” leading from a central hub. Can’t play? Use the colorful trains to mark the end of your turn. This is the perfect chess set to add to your family game collection and is great for both beginners and experienced players. This set includes a folding chess board and full-size Staunton chess pieces, which features a 2.63″ King. It’s Codemaker vs. Codebreaker to find who will be the Mastermind! The Codemaker creates a secret code. The Codebreaker tries to match the code using logic, deduction and a little bit of luck. Can you crack the code in 10 moves or less?
Minimum Age 6+ 6+ 6+ 8+ 8+
Minimum Players 2 2 1 2 2
Maximum Players 2 2 8 2 2

4.5
Price: $11.99 - $9.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:20:02 UTC – Details)

Tap out ice blocks one by one, but Don’t Break the Ice! The object of this classic game is to keep Phillip the Penguin on top of the ice, but as the game goes on, the ice blocks start falling. One wrong block, and he’ll go ker-plop! The player who can keep Phillip from falling, wins! Play 1-on-1 or as a team of 2! Hasbro and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.
Players tap out ice blocks one by one
To win, keep Phillip the Penguin on top
Play with 2-4 players
Includes 2 mallets, ice tray frame, 4 ice tray legs,1 large ice block, 32 small ice blocks, Phillip the Penguin figure, and instructions

Corporate Social Responsibility

Hasbro is committed to being an ethical and responsible company and is a recognized toy industry leader in the areas of product safety, environmental sustainability, ethical sourcing and philanthropy.

Don’t Break the Ice Game

Can you help Phillip the Penguin chop some ice blocks so he can make a new igloo? But brrrrr, that water’s cold, even for him! Don’t Break the Ice is the suspenseful game of strategy where the object is to knock out the blocks of ice. But be careful – don’t break the ice that makes Phillip fall through!

  • Players tap out ice blocks one by one
  • To win, keep Phillip the Penguin on top
  • Play with 2-4 players
  • Ages 3 and up

Read more

Keep Phillip from Falling

Tap out ice blocks one by one, but Don’t Break the Ice! The object of this classic game is to keep Phillip the Penguin on top of the ice, but as the game goes on, the ice blocks start falling. One wrong block, and he’ll go ker-plop! The player who can keep Phillip from falling, wins! Game includes 2 mallets, ice tray frame, 4 ice tray legs,1 large ice block, 32 small ice blocks, and Phillip the Penguin figure.

Take Turns Challenging Friends and Family

Host a game night and challenge your friends and family in Don’t Break the Ice! If one player removes a block without Phillip the Penguin falling through, they stay in the game, and it’s the next player’s turn. But if a player breaks the ice and Phillip falls through, they’re out! Reset the blocks to start a new round with the remaining players. The last player left who hasn’t made Phillip fall through the ice is the winner! Play 1-on-1!

Great Family Fun

Whether via a game board with dice, a deck of cards, simple lines drawn on scrap paper, or electronic media, gaming is a global pastime that has enriched culture for millennia. From the classic tabletop board games to up-and-active games for preschoolers, to the laugh-out-loud party games, Hasbro Gaming is a one-stop-shop for filling your games closet. While continuing to produce some of the most memorable games in the history of family gaming, Hasbro Gaming stays current and innovative, and often partners with some of the biggest names in entertainment.

Read more

Includes

Includes 2 mallets, ice tray frame, 4 ice tray legs,1 large ice block, 32 small ice blocks, Phillip the Penguin figure, and instructions.

Hasbro and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.

Price: $35.99 - $19.59
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:22:04 UTC – Details)


Who says football has to stay on the field? With the Franklin Sports inflatable 3-hole football target set, Kids have everything they need to take your football practice to the next level, Whether you’re in your backyard, basement or at the beach. This set includes a manual hand air pump to use to inflate the (2) 7.25” footballs. The rotation molded footballs’ size and weight make them very versatile for indoor and outdoor play. They’re fun for all ages and abilities, and perfect for pre-pee wee football players (3-6 years old) or older players looking to improve their ball control and accuracy skills. The football target inflates to nearly 45″ Inches tall and has 3 target holes included, making it the perfect dynamic practice partner for QB football drills, whether you’re spiraling solo or passing with another player. To ensure that the inflatable football target doesn’t get blown away by your powerful arm, fill the smaller section on the bottom with water or sand before inflating the top section with the Air pump. Whether as an addition to your athletic equipment collection or as a birthday, holiday, or anytime gift, you’re sure to score a touchdown with the Franklin Sports inflatable 3-hole football target set.
Football on the go: The inflatable 3-hole football stores and travels easily, making it perfect for practice, throw-offs & pick-up games anywhere.
Practice & Recreational use: turn the basement, backyard, park or beach into your own football field. Or, set it up at your next birthday party or neighborhood gathering for some friendly competition.
Hours of fun: Whether you want to be the next greatest quarterback of all time or just have a good time, This set offers football fun for you, your family, and all your friends.
Sturdy construction: made of durable PVC to stand up to the strongest of throws and kicks. The water-filled base adds additional stability so when the target is knocked down it pops right back up.
Set includes: (1) 45” inflatable 3-hole football target with water-fillable base, (2) 7.25” rotationally molded PVC footballs, (1) sports ball hand air pump with needle

Read more
